Detailed Description

Class FaceOverlap represents the intersection between two face centered geometry boxes. It is a subclass of hier::BoxOverlap and records the portions of index space that needs to be copied between two objects with face centered geometry.

See also:
hier::BoxOverlap

pdat::FaceOverlap

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::FaceOverlap ( const tbox::Array< hier::BoxContainer > &  boxes,
const hier::Transformation &  transformation 
)

The constructor takes the list of boxes and the transformation from source to destination index spaces. This information is used later in the generation of communication schedules.

SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::~FaceOverlap (  )  [virtual]

The virtual destructor does nothing interesting except deallocate box data.

Member Function Documentation

bool SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::isOverlapEmpty (  )  const [virtual]

Return whether there is an empty intersection between the two face centered boxes. This method over-rides the virtual function in the hier::BoxOverlap base class.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.

const hier::BoxContainer & SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::getDestinationBoxContainer ( const int  axis  )  const [virtual]

Return the list of boxes (in face centered index space) that constitute the intersection. The boxes are given in the destination coordinate space and must be shifted by -(getSourceOffset()) to lie in the source index space. The axis argument represents which axis is desired: X=0, Y=1, and Z=2.

Precondition:
(axis >= 0) && (axis < d_dst_boxes.size())

void SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::getSourceBoxContainer ( hier::BoxContainer &  src_boxes,
int &  normal_direction 
) const [virtual]

Get a BoxContainer representing the source boxes of the overlap.

The src_boxes container will be filled with face-centered source boxes of the overlap in the source coordinate space. The given normal direction is the normal in destination space on input and in source space on output.

Parameters:
[out] src_boxes 
[in,out] normal_direction 
Precondition:
src_boxes.isEmpty()

normal_direction >= 0 && normal_direction < d_dst_boxes.size()

Postcondition:
normal_direction >= 0 && normal_direction < d_dst_boxes.size()

const hier::IntVector & SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::getSourceOffset (  )  const [virtual]

Return the offset between the destination and source index spaces. The destination index space is the source index space shifted by this amount.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.

const hier::Transformation & SAMRAI::pdat::FaceOverlap::getTransformation (  )  const [virtual]

Refturn the transformation between the destination and source index spaces.

The destination index space is the source index space rotated and shifted by the returned transformation.

Returns:
The transformation.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::BoxOverlap.
